title: Print, "Citibank Withdrawal Slip Design", ca. 1975
description:
Citibank withdrawal form divided into 3 registers vertically with orange on white paper. Left register: Orange ground with white text. Printed vertically from top left: Withdrawal Golden Passbook. Printed Horizontally at bottom left: Item 18412/ (SF 3487(L)/ Rev 3-76). 
Center register: White ground with orange text. Top left: Withdrawal Golden Passbook. Ten lines below for account holder's information. At bottom a disclaimer is printed in orange text running length of second and third register. Right register: White ground and orange text. Citibank logo in top right corner with thick line under. Under this printed: Dollars, Cents each with own space below. Rectangle under followed by a space then halfyway down form: For Bank/ Use Only printed above thick  line with a space left followed by a thick line with two thin lines underneath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Citibank Withdrawal Slip Design", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Photo offselt lithography. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-65.
